div.div: Adds date formatting and URL ID conversion utilities

Adds article-related interfaces for structured content
Introduces TypeScript interfaces for managing article categories, introductions, and content structures.
These additions enable better organization and type safety for article-related data throughout the application.

Adds comprehensive mental health resource tools
Introduces a collection of articles and guides focused on various mental health practices, including cognitive-behavioral therapy exercises, mindfulness techniques, and resilience-building tools.
These resources aim to empower individuals by providing structured approaches to improve emotional well-being, enhance coping mechanisms, and foster self-reflection.
The additions support a holistic approach to mental health and aim to create lasting positive changes in users' lives.

Adds social media icons and article context provider
Introduces new SVG components for social media icons, enhancing the UI with visual elements for X, Instagram, GitHub, and LinkedIn.
Implements an ArticleContext provider to manage and share article data across components, improving state management and accessibility in the application.
Updates the MenuBarNav styling for better alignment and spacing in the layout.

Adds Container components for layout management
Introduces `ContainerOuter`, `ContainerInner`, and a wrapper `Container` component to enhance layout capabilities in the application.
These components utilize `forwardRef` for better reference handling and leverage `clsx` for dynamic class management, providing a more flexible and responsive design structure.

Adds blog article data component for dynamic content rendering
Introduces a new component to fetch and display blog article data based on the URL slug.
Implements dynamic loading of article content, including titles, subtitles, images, sections, and conclusions, enhancing the user experience by providing tailored content.
This change improves maintainability by allowing articles to be easily added or updated through modular imports.

Adds layout component for article detail pages
Implements a new layout component that provides context for article detail pages.
It integrates the ArticleProvider to manage article-related state and displays the article title and description dynamically based on the URL path.
This enhances the user experience by ensuring relevant information is presented for each article.

Adds article listing and category filtering component
Implements a new page for displaying articles with category filtering and pagination functionality.
Includes reusable components for categories and posts, enhancing user navigation and content discovery.
This update improves the user experience by organizing articles and allowing easier access to specific content based on categories.
Refactor Home component to improve structure and add image gallery
Remove unused styles from main element in globals.css
Add new image assets including avatars and various photos
Add dependencies for Heroicons and Day.js; update TypeScript paths for styles and images
Add new SVG logos for various brands including Airbnb, Animaginary, Cosmos, Facebook, Helio Stream, Open Shuttle, Planetaria, and Starbucks
Refactor Home component structure and remove unused button variant
Update color variables and replace NavBar with MenuBarNav in layout
Add MenuBarNav component and menuData for navigation structure
Add className to NavigationMenu for styling
Adds Menubar component and updates package.json with @radix-ui/react-menubar dependency
Adds new font files: Sansita-Black, Spectral-ExtraBold, and Yrsa-VariableFont
Adds tw-animate-css dependency and updates styles for new animations
Created new branch main in tmchuynh/mental-health-non-profit

Adds Investment Property Cash Flow Calculator component
Implements a new calculator for estimating annual cash flow from rental properties.
Users can input monthly rent, vacancy rate, expenses, mortgage payments, and other income to calculate net cash flow and various income metrics.
This feature enhances the app's functionality, providing valuable insights for property investors and landlords.

Adds home renovation cost calculator component
Introduces a new component that allows users to estimate home renovation costs and potential value added based on various renovation types.
Users can input home value, select renovation types, and calculate total costs, percentage of home value, and estimated value added.
This tool enhances user experience by providing a clear understanding of renovation investments.
Adds tips for beginners and a step-by-step example to the Home Equity Loan Calculator
Enhances Home Insurance Calculator with improved input fields and added tips for beginners
Enhances Rental Income Calculator with beginner tips and improved input fields
Adds typical input values table and enhanced input fields for Rent vs Buy calculator
Adds step-by-step example and input fields for mortgage refinance calculations
Enhances Mortgage Payment Calculator with beginner tips and improved input layout

Adds rental income calculator component
Introduces a new component that allows users to estimate their annual rental income and net operating income (NOI) by inputting rental details such as monthly rent, vacancy rate, and expenses.
This feature enhances the application's functionality, providing users with essential financial insights related to rental properties.
Improves user experience by offering informative explanations and a structured interface for calculations.

Adds Real Estate Commission Calculator component
Introduces a new React component that calculates real estate commissions based on sale price, commission rate, and broker split.
Enhances user experience by providing detailed explanations of commission structures and typical input values, allowing users to estimate how commissions are divided among agents and brokers.
Improves functionality by validating inputs and displaying results dynamically.

Adds Property Tax Calculator component
Introduces a new Property Tax Calculator that allows users to estimate their annual property tax based on property value and tax rate inputs.
The component includes user input fields, a calculation function, and informative content about property tax, making it beneficial for users to understand and manage their property tax obligations.

Adds mortgage refinance calculator component
Introduces a new mortgage refinance calculator that allows users to estimate new monthly payments, savings, and break-even points when refinancing their mortgage.
The component includes input fields for current balance, interest rates, loan terms, and closing costs, alongside the logic to calculate the necessary values. This functionality enhances user experience by providing valuable financial insights.

Adds mortgage payoff calculator component
Implements a new mortgage payoff calculator that allows users to input loan details and calculate potential savings from making extra payments.
The component includes functions for calculating monthly payments, remaining balance, and payoff timelines. It also provides a user-friendly interface with explanations of key terms and displays results for original and new payoff scenarios.
Enhances the application's financial tools by providing valuable insights into mortgage management.

Adds mortgage payment calculator component
Implements a new mortgage payment calculator that allows users to input loan amount, interest rate, and loan term to calculate their estimated monthly payment.
The component includes detailed explanations of mortgage terms and a step-by-step calculation guide to assist users in understanding their payments.
Enhances user experience by providing real-time feedback on calculated payments based on user input.

Adds Home Insurance Calculator component
Implements a new Home Insurance Calculator feature that allows users to estimate their annual home insurance premium based on home value, coverage percent, annual rate, and deductible.
Includes user-friendly input fields, detailed explanations of key insurance terms, and instructions on how premiums are calculated.
The component enhances the application's functionality and provides valuable information to users about home insurance.

Adds Home Equity Loan Calculator component
Implements a new Home Equity Loan Calculator, allowing users to estimate their borrowing capacity and monthly payments based on home value, mortgage balance, loan-to-value ratio, interest rate, and loan term.
The component includes detailed explanations of key terms, calculation methods, and a user-friendly interface for input and results display.
Enhances user engagement by providing essential financial insights and tools for home equity loans.

Adds Home Affordability Calculator component
Introduces a new component that allows users to calculate the maximum home price they can afford based on their financial inputs, including annual income, down payment, monthly debts, interest rate, and loan term.
The component implements necessary calculations following common lending rules, providing a user-friendly interface with detailed guidance on home affordability factors and tips for buyers.
This enhancement aims to assist users in making informed financial decisions regarding home purchases.

Adds a closing cost calculator component
Introduces a new component for calculating estimated closing costs when purchasing a home.
This feature allows users to input home price, closing cost rate, and any additional custom costs to calculate total expenses. It also provides informative content on common closing costs, their calculations, and tips for saving money.
Enhances the user experience by offering an interactive tool for better financial planning in home buying.

Adds Rent vs Buy Home Calculator component
Implements a new calculator to compare the total costs of renting versus buying a home over a specified duration.
This component allows users to input various parameters such as monthly rent, home price, mortgage rate, and more, and provides a recommendation based on the computed costs.
Enhances financial decision-making by clearly outlining the costs involved in both options.
Renames "Rent vs. Buy Calculator" to "Rent vs Buy Home Calculator" for clarity and updates the corresponding ID.
Adds example table for typical personal assets and liabilities in Working Capital Calculator
Enhances Working Capital Calculator description and structure for clarity and user understanding

Refactors business partnership checklist categories
Updates the business partnership checklist categories to consolidate similar entries and improve clarity.
Removes redundant checklists related to valuation, investment strategy, risk management, and exit strategy, streamlining the category structure.
Modifies the ID and title of the "Business Partnership Research" checklist for consistency.

Refines financial calculator descriptions for clarity
Enhances the user interface of various financial calculators by updating headings and descriptions to provide clearer guidance on their functionalities.
Improves overall readability and user comprehension, ensuring that users can easily understand the purpose and benefits of each calculator.
Removes unnecessary styling elements for a cleaner look and incorporates more informative content to aid user decision-making.

Adds multiple financial ratio calculators
Introduces new calculators for financial ratios, including Current Ratio, Debt Service Coverage Ratio, Expense Ratio, Net Profit Margin, Operating Margin, Quick Ratio, Return on Assets, and Payroll Tax.
These tools enhance the application's functionality by aiding users in assessing their business's financial health through effective calculations.
Improves user experience with informative interfaces for each calculator, helping users make better financial decisions.
Adds business growth, operations, partnerships, customer service, financial planning, human resources, and marketing strategy checklists

Adds Cash Conversion Cycle Calculator component
Introduces a new calculator to compute the cash conversion cycle (CCC) for businesses.
The component allows users to input days inventory outstanding, days sales outstanding, and days payables outstanding, providing a calculated result along with an explanation of the CCC's significance.
This enhancement improves user capability to assess financial efficiency through a clear and interactive interface.

Adds cash flow management calculator component
Introduces a new calculator for managing cash flow, allowing users to input cash inflows, outflows, and starting cash balance.
Calculates net cash flow and ending cash position, helping users analyze financial health and ensure liquidity.
Provides a user-friendly interface with clear instructions and results display.

Adds cash flow forecasting calculator component
Introduces a new component for forecasting monthly cash flow, allowing users to estimate their business's cash position by inputting starting cash, monthly income, expenses, and payment timing.
Implements state management for user inputs and results, improving financial planning capabilities for businesses.

Adds business loan calculator component
Implements a new business loan calculator feature that allows users to estimate monthly payments, total interest, and total loan costs.
The component uses React hooks for state management and includes input fields for loan amount, annual interest rate, and loan term. It provides a clear user interface and straightforward calculations based on standard loan formulas.
Enhances the user experience by providing instant feedback on loan calculations.

Adds business expense tracker component
Introduces a new component for tracking and analyzing business expenses.
Users can input revenue and expenses, categorize them, and determine key metrics such as total expenses and expense ratios.
This feature enhances financial management capabilities within the application, providing insights for better budgeting decisions.

Adds Break-Even Point Calculator component
Introduces a new calculator component that allows users to determine the break-even point for their business operations.
The component captures fixed costs, variable costs per unit, and price per unit, then calculates key financial metrics such as contribution margin, break-even units, and break-even sales.
This enhancement aims to improve financial decision-making for users by providing a user-friendly interface for profitability analysis.
Renames Expense Tracker to Business Expense Tracker for clarity and consistency

Adds Inventory Turnover Ratio Calculator component
Introduces a new component for calculating the inventory turnover ratio, enhancing the finance calculators suite.
The component allows users to input cost of goods sold and average inventory, providing calculations for turnover ratio and days sales of inventory. It includes explanations and formulas to assist users in understanding the importance of the metric for inventory management.
This addition improves user experience by offering a tool for better inventory optimization and cash flow management.

Adds Profit Margin Calculator component
Implements a new Profit Margin Calculator to help users assess their business's financial health by calculating profit margins based on revenue and cost inputs.
The calculator provides an interactive UI for input, validates user data, and displays the calculated profit margin percentage. This tool enhances decision-making regarding pricing and cost management.
